content: Latest builds of the CQL specification are not building the markdown pages. I tried adding page entries specifically for those pages, but the build still isn't picking them up.
I'm guessing this is because it's not using templates?
I'm prepping an errata, would the IG need to be updated to use templates to publish an errata?

So I fixed that issue by switching from markdown to ASCII-doc for the source, so the build QA is clean now. This would be an errata publication, so we're proposing version 1.5.2 and that it is an in-place update, rather than a new version. Is that possible to do with an "ig"?
